resources.string: You don\'t have any rentals out.
Click the button below to find a movie.
Hey, I just rented a new movie…
Warn me when a rental is older than:
That username is invalid. Redbox.com usernames must be email addresses.
You must supply both a username and a password to set up automatic updating. Or you can clear both username and password if you want to turn off automatic updating.

Please read this one-time usage note!

Remember the Redbox! can automatically connect to Redbox.com to download movies that you have rented.

To set up Redbox Automatic Update, please touch the button at the bottom of the \'My Rentals\' screen.

If you don\'t want to use Redbox Automatic Update, you can still enter movies manually by touching the \'New Rental\' button at the top of the screen.

Thanks!

Remember the Redbox! can automatically connect to Redbox.com to download movies that you have rented.
In order for this to work, you must:
  • Sign up for a Redbox.com account (or already have an account)
  • Make sure that the credit cards that you use to rent movies are listed on your Redbox.com account
  • Enter your Redbox.com username and password on this screen
Once you have done this, whenever you rent a Redbox movie with a registered credit card, the Redbox.com website will update your transation history, usually within a few hours of your rental.

Remember the Redbox! will connect to Redbox.com once per day and see if you have any movies newly rented or returned. If your Redbox.com transaction history has changed then we will automatically adjust your rented movies list.

If you always use the credit cards you added to your Redbox.com account to rent movies, you will get reminders without ever having to enter a movie manually.
Remember the Redbox! can automatically update your movie list from your Redbox.com account.

Remember the Redbox! {{version}}

Touch Dismiss to dismiss this message, or Snooze to be reminded again later.
